name: $resourceType
desc: Returns the FHIR type name for this instance

name: $code
desc: Returns: A code (or set of codes) that specify this medication, or a textual description if no code is available. Usage note: This could be a standard medication code such as a code from RxNorm, SNOMED CT, IDMP etc. It could also be a national or local formulary code, optionally with translations to other code systems.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A code (or set of codes) that specify this medication, or a textual description if no code is available. Usage note: This could be a standard medication code such as a code from RxNorm, SNOMED CT, IDMP etc. It could also be a national or local formulary c

name: $status
desc: Returns: A code to indicate if the medication is in active use.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A code to indicate if the medication is in active use.

name: $isBrand
desc: Returns: Set to true if the item is attributable to a specific manufacturer.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Set to true if the item is attributable to a specific manufacturer.

name: $isOverTheCounter
desc: Returns: Set to true if the medication can be obtained without an order from a prescriber.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Set to true if the medication can be obtained without an order from a prescriber.

name: $manufacturer
desc: Returns: Describes the details of the manufacturer of the medication product.  This is not intended to represent the distributor of a medication product.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Describes the details of the manufacturer of the medication product.  This is not intended to represent the distributor of a medication product.

name: $form
desc: Returns: Describes the form of the item.  Powder; tablets; capsule.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Describes the form of the item.  Powder; tablets; capsule.

name: $ingredient
desc: Returns: Identifies a particular constituent of interest in the product.

name: $addingredient
desc: Identifies a particular constituent of interest in the product.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Identifies a particular constituent of interest in the product.

name: $package
desc: Returns: Information that only applies to packages (not products).

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Information that only applies to packages (not products).

name: $image
desc: Returns: Photo(s) or graphic representation(s) of the medication.

name: $addimage
desc: Photo(s) or graphic representation(s) of the medication.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Photo(s) or graphic representation(s) of the medication.
